function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workers being in close proximity to each other","Impact":"High risk of becoming infected","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, providing personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, health screening technologies","People":"Construction workers, hotel staff, trade union members","Owner":"Construction companies, hotel management, trade unions"},{"Description":"Difficulty in finding open hotels","Impact":"Reduced availability of accommodations for workers, potential increase in transmission rates","Mitigation":"Expanding and securing accommodations, implementing strict cleanliness standards","Technologies":"Digital booking platforms, sanitization technologies","People":"Construction workers, hotel management","Owner":"Construction companies, hotel management"},{"Description":"Lack of control over hotel cleanliness standards","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Establishing partnerships with trusted hotels, conducting regular inspections","Technologies":"Sensor-based monitoring systems, digital checklists for cleanliness standards","People":"Construction workers, hotel management","Owner":"Construction companies, hotel management"}]}
